verses.text: The \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \add and\add* all the \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, shall have no \w part|strong="H2506"\w* nor \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* with \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: they shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w offerings|strong="H0801"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*, and his \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.

Therefore shall they have no \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*: the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* their \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, as he hath \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto them.

¶ And this shall be the \w priest’s|strong="H3548"\w* \w due|strong="H4941"\w* from the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, from them that \w offer|strong="H2076"\w* a \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*, whether \add it be\add* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* or \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w*; and they shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* the \w shoulder|strong="H2220"\w*, and the two \w cheeks|strong="H3895"\w*, and the \w maw|strong="H6896"\w*.

The \w firstfruit|strong="H7225"\w* \add also\add* of thy \w corn|strong="H1715"\w*, of thy \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, and of thine \w oil|strong="H3323"\w*, and the \w first|strong="H7225"\w* of the \w fleece|strong="H1488"\w* of thy \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, shalt thou \w give|strong="H5414"\w* him.

For the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* him out of all thy \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*, to \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* to \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, him and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* for \w ever|strong="H3117"\w*.

¶ And if a \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* from \w any|strong="H0259"\w* of thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* out of all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, where he \w sojourned|strong="H1481"\w*, and \w come|strong="H0935"\w* with all the \w desire|strong="H0185"\w* of his \w mind|strong="H5315"\w* unto the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*;

Then he shall \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* his \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, as all his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \add do\add*, which \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* there \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

They shall have like \w portions|strong="H2506"\w* to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, beside that which cometh of the \w sale|strong="H4465"\w* of his \w patrimony|strong="H0001"\w*.\f + \fr 18.8 \ft that…: Heb. his sale by the fathers\f*

¶ When thou art \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* thee, thou shalt not \w learn|strong="H3925"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* after the \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* of those \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.

There shall not be \w found|strong="H4672"\w* among you \add any one\add* that maketh his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* or his \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* to \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* through the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \add or\add* that \w useth|strong="H7080"\w* \w divination|strong="H7081"\w*, \add or\add* an observer of \w times|strong="H6049"\w*, or an \w enchanter|strong="H5172"\w*, or a \w witch|strong="H3784"\w*,
Or a \w charmer|strong="H2266"\w*, or a \w consulter|strong="H7592"\w* with familiar \w spirits|strong="H0178"\w*, or a \w wizard|strong="H3049"\w*, or a \w necromancer|strong="H1875"\w*.

For all that \w do|strong="H6213"\w* these things \add are\add* an \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: and \w because|strong="H1558"\w* of these \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* doth drive them \w out|strong="H3423"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee.
Thou shalt be \w perfect|strong="H8549"\w* with the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 18.13 \ft perfect: or, upright, or, sincere\f*

For these \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, which thou shalt \w possess|strong="H3423"\w*, \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* unto observers of \w times|strong="H6049"\w*, and unto \w diviners|strong="H7080"\w*: but as for thee, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath not \w suffered|strong="H5414"\w* thee so \add to do\add*.\f + \fr 18.14 \ft possess: or, inherit\f*

¶ The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* will raise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* unto thee a \w Prophet|strong="H5030"\w* from the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of thee, of thy \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, like unto me; unto him ye shall \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w*;

According to all that thou \w desiredst|strong="H7592"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in \w Horeb|strong="H2722"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Let me not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, neither let me \w see|strong="H7200"\w* this \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* any more, that I \w die|strong="H4191"\w* not.
And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, They have \w well|strong="H3190"\w* \add spoken that\add* which they have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*.

I will raise them \w up|strong="H6965"\w* a \w Prophet|strong="H5030"\w* from \w among|strong="H7130"\w* their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, like unto thee, and will \w put|strong="H5414"\w* my \w words|strong="H1697"\w* in his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*; and he shall \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto them all that I shall \w command|strong="H6680"\w* him.

And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* \w whosoever|strong="H0376"\w* will not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto my \w words|strong="H1697"\w* which he shall \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* in my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, I will \w require|strong="H1875"\w* \add it\add* of him.

But the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, which shall \w presume|strong="H2102"\w* to \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* a \w word|strong="H1697"\w* in my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, which I have not \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* him to \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*, or that shall \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, even that \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

And if thou \w say|strong="H0559"\w* in thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, How shall we \w know|strong="H3045"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath not \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*?

When a \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w speaketh|strong="H1696"\w* in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, if the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* follow not, nor come to \w pass|strong="H0935"\w*, that \add is\add* the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath not \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*, \add but\add* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* it \w presumptuously|strong="H2087"\w*: thou shalt not be \w afraid|strong="H1481"\w* of him.
